content: How do you prefer to spend your free time for leisure and enjoyment?
swimminmg

Balancing responsibilities

Outgoing,Introverted,Analytical,Creative,Optimistic,Reserved,Adventurous,Reliable,Easygoing,Assertive

Dishonesty,Injustice,Cruelty,Arrogance,Hypocrisy,Laziness,Intolerance,Betrayal,Negativity,Rudeness
